altername_name: ドラゴンクエストモンスターズ　テリーのワンダーランドRETRO
name: Dragon Quest Monsters: Terry's Wonderland Retro
overview: Released for the Game Boy in 1998, Dragon Quest Monsters: Terry's Wonderland Retro has been revived on Nintendo Switch after more than 20 years. Play as Terry, who enters an unknown world called "Taiju no Kuni" in search of his kidnapped sister, Mireille. Will the young siblings ever meet again? Enjoy "retro" play with a simple system, a nostalgic dot screen, and an 8-bit sound source from the original era. Not only can you play in color, but you can also switch the screen to monochrome by changing the settings. In addition, some features are unique to Nintendo Switch, such as selecting the background that surrounds the screen and changing the size of the game screen. * The design and parameters in the game have been partially changed from the Game Boy version. * The communication battle function and communication matchmaking function that were in the Game Boy version are not installed in this work.
